resources.string: To use the default parameters during the data transfer of the upgrade.
Changing the transfer parameters can break the upgrade process. Please confirm to access the transfer parameters.
Force the system to send the Bluetooth packet. For Android performances this is not recommended.
Wait for a packet to be acknowledged to send the next one during the upload.
Set the chunk size for data upload
Set the number of data bytes to be sent in a packet during the upload. \n- protocol <4: range is 1 to 250. \n- protocol >=4: range is to 65530 - subject to the device maximum support.
The device supports a chunk size from 1 to %1$s.
The battery is low on this device. Please connect it to a charger.
The file is ready for installation. \nDo you want to proceed? \nThe device might reboot.

The device has updated its software. Do you want to commit the upgrade? \n\nPlease note that this can result in a reboot of the device. This would terminate any ongoing connection with the device – streaming, call, etc.
A previous unfinished upgrade has been processed with a different file. By continuing the current upgrade the device will loose all information from that previous upgrade. \nDo you want to continue?

Please put both earbuds in the case and close the lid to continue the upgrade. 
Please do not open the lid until the upgrade has completed. 

This alert will disappear once the earbuds are in case and the lid closed.
Please upgrade the Earbuds to version: %1$d.%2$d, PS-version %3$d
An error has occurred during the upgrade.
The upgrade has failed due to a protocol error. \nPlease look for a more recent version of this mobile application.
The file is incompatible, empty or non existent, the upgrade has been aborted.
The application failed to reconnect with the device within 40 seconds. \nPlease try to reconnect manually from the application settings and restart the upgrade.
The upgrade has failed due to a process error.
The device is not ready for an update. \nThe process has been aborted, try again later.
The upgrade has failed due to an internal process error. \nPlease look for a more recent version of this mobile application.
The upgrade could not be started, the device is already processing another upgrade.
The selected option is not supported by the device. \nPlease restart the upgrade and select a different option.
The upgrade has failed due to an error on the device.
The upgrade was installed but the security version could not be updated. \nTrying again may resolve the version update.
The file has successfully been uploaded to the device. \nThe device will reboot at a later time to install the update.
The upgrade was cancelled as a different upgrade is currently in progress.
